title: How Unpacking's Developers Designed 2021's Coziest Game | Design Delve
description:
This week on Design Delve, JM8 and Marty are speaking with Wren Brier and Tim Dawson, the creators of Unpacking about the game's design and how they made the coziest game of 2021.
